item.description: Paul Pearson - Curriculum Vitae -- Paul Pearson pearsonp@hope.edu paultpearson.github.io Education Ph.D in Mathematics June 2006 Northwestern University, Evanston, Illinois Thesis: The mod p homology of topological modular forms Advisor: Paul Goerss BA in Mathematics May 2001 Saint Olaf College, Northfield, Minnesota Honors: Phi Beta Kappa, summa cum laude, departmental distinction Work Experience Associate Professor July 2018 - present Department of Mathematics, Hope College, Holland, Michigan
